google_reviews.author: Halfkin Rainbolt
google_reviews.review: I moved in,  early 2022, shortly after the business was bought by a new company. I have had a wonderful experience with the management and no problems to speak of. The maintenance is good, prompt and friendly. I recommend this to others.

google_reviews.author: Lynda Galbraith
google_reviews.review: We delivered to a nice lady here. The one bedroom was nice size. Nice inside. Seems quiet

google_reviews.author: Andrew Davis

google_reviews.author: Mesake Tudrau
google_reviews.review: It's  an old apartment with high rent. I suppose to get a refund back but it seems like they don't bother. A stubborn officer with not very friendly approach in the ofgice.

google_reviews.author: Tasha Beckham
google_reviews.review: We needed a new washer and they brought over a used dirty one and it started spitting all this dirty and stuff but now my kids blankets smell so bad and have stuff all over it smh
